attributes.action: Create a Artificial 3G football pitch on mossway field, alkrington, Middleton
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When kids in our area play football on the local fields they always seem to be thrown of by near by residents. And they do nothing wrong. It is creating more problems such as kids are going out causing trouble instead of playing sports. If we had a Designated area such as 3G astro-turf all weather pitch, everyone in the local area would be able to access it and pay to use it.
